revised_title: Application of Kinetic Theory to Electric, Magnetic, and Optical Properties of Diatomic Gases
tldr: The author applies the kinetic theory of gases to study the electric, magnetic, and optical properties of diatomic gases. They analyze the behavior of molecules in different classes and their effects on various properties. The study provides insights into the dielectric constant, refractive index, and the coefficient of rotation of the plane of polarization in a magnetic field.
